column2: "I'm I can't help but wonder about that... could...could you do an investigation, even a small one?!"

"We can't just leave the residential
area like this forever..."

"Just sitting here contemplating it
isn't going to do do anything!
We have to hurry over there!"

"I'm sorry for always just taking your time!
I'm counting on you!"

"なんか気になりだしてきた……
少し……少しでいいから
調査をお願いできないかな！？"

"いつまでも市街地をこのままに
しておけないし……"

"ここで考えていても
らちが開かないよね？
急いで現場に向かってみて！"

"手間ばっかりかけてごめんなさい！
よろしくねっ！"
